data.eml:eml: Taxonomy and nomenclature of some mainland SE-Asian Coeliccia species (Odonata, Platycnemididae) using micro-CT analysis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Steinhoff, Philip O. M., Uhl, Gabriele (2015): Taxonomy and nomenclature of some mainland SE-Asian Coeliccia species (Odonata, Platycnemididae) using micro-CT analysis. Zootaxa 4059 (2): 257-276, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.2.2
